resources.string: Welcome to the test GUI of online-offline attribute-based encryption scheme. Please select other items to start test.
Please enter the security level for generating public parameters and public keys. (Note: Use 128 only when running this program on high-end devices)
Please enter the number of attributes (\u003c 31)
Check this box if you want to test the online-offline feature of encryption
Hint: The key policy is attribute_1 AND attribute_2 ...AND attribute_n, where n is the number you enter below
